short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables Picture-in-Picture and brightness control on pages max & youtube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Brightness and PiP Extension enhances your browsing experience by adding Picture-in-Picture (PiP) mode and brightness control to any website, including sites like YouTube, Max, 

 This extension allows you to watch videos in a floating, resizable window while browsing other tabs or applications. Additionally, you can adjust the screen brightness directly on any webpage, making it easier on the eyes during late-night browsing sessions.

Features:

Picture-in-Picture Mode (PiP): Double-click any video to enable PiP mode, allowing you to keep the video on top of other windows while multitasking.
Brightness Control: Use the built-in brightness slider to adjust the screen's brightness on any webpage, enhancing visibility and comfort in different lighting conditions.





















































Trial Mode with Access Code: The extension starts in a trial mode, showing a banner after 2 minutes of installation. To continue using all features without interruption, obtain an access code via the provided link in the banner.
